name: end_bound
description:
What is death? A scary mask. Take it off – see, it doesn’t bite. Eventually, body and soul will have to separate, just as they existed separately before we were born. So why be upset if it happens now? If it isn’t now, it’s later.

— Epictetus

This piece was hand-drawn (with mouse and stylus) and animated using Aseprite. Its seamless loop consists 480 frames. Each frame lasts 42 milliseconds. The colors are derived from the PICO-8 palette and opacity blending. 576x576. 33.8MB.
